text: ShaqDBirdI$kShayatiq ShaDvA Ruqtava# RuqtuBi#rEqvaina#M dIkShayati saqptaBi#rdIkShayati saqpta CandA(gm)#siq CandO#BirEqvaina#M dIkShayatiq viSvE# dEqvasya# nEqturitya#-nuqShTuBO$ttaqmayA# juhOtiq vAgvA a#nuqShTup tasmA$t prAqNAnAqM ~MvAgu#ttaqmai- ka#smAdaqkSharAqdanA$ptaM prathaqmaM paqdaM tasmAqd-yad-vAqcO&nA$ptaqM tanma#nuqShyA# upa# jIvanti pUqrNayA# juhOti pUqrNa i#vaq hi praqjApa#tiH - [  ] 45
